channel.title: Help with delta
channel.description:
hey guys, i have a delta source and i have a problem. when i log out there is a delay between client and server, so if i try to log back in straight away it blocks my ip because it thinks im flooding the server. how can i fix this?
Ive checked the login method but cant seem to find anything strange...
thanks.
